snippet: The release of its results helped ease investor concern that Toshiba risked delisting, and raised hopes that the company was moving beyond an accounting scandal.
abstract: Toshiba reports net loss of 37.8 billion yen, or $318 million, for last fiscal year amid accounting scandal; results of long-delayed report send shares up 1.8 percent.
lead_paragraph: The release of its results helped ease investor concern that Toshiba risked delisting, and raised hopes that the company was moving beyond an accounting scandal.

headline.main: After Delays, Toshiba Posts a Yearly Loss
headline.print_headline: After Delays, Toshiba Posts a Yearly Loss
